After playing Bioshock 1 and 2, which was superb in my opinion, they changed too much in Infinite.
The fun from the underwater world was gone, and you get a "helper" following you around (to block your path and just being generally annoying) 
The DLC "Buried at sea" part I and II was supposed to take you back to the old underwater world, but it was to short and the story too confusing to be fun. 
Generally disappointing game and DLC's. 
I had expected more from the devs, to be honest.

神作

我是一名普普通通的大学生，只会在游戏打折到30几元之内的时候入手。直到我遇见了伊丽莎白。
有剧透内容！！！！！！！！！
以下是我的游戏史



我玩游戏本体是在玩1  2之前的，进游戏由灯塔到了天空之城，经历了由黑暗到光明的转变，我的内心并没有什么波澜，看到画质还蛮不错的就退出了，我去网上查阅了一下资料，网上的伙伴推荐按照1  2  无限   海葬（dlc）的顺序来游玩，虽然无限的剧情在两者之前。于是我便开始了我的生化奇兵之旅，在此之前先说一说自己的理解我认为生化奇兵2是最让人惊喜的。至于为什么我之后会做出自己的解释，第一部玩的我浑浑噩噩的直到杀掉主人公的亲生父亲之前我甚至不知道我到底是为了什么，不过就这样特殊的游戏机制（破解机器是真的浪费时间）取得了我的极大好奇心，各种异能，各种武器，虽然我玩的是普通用模式同时菜的一批，有的时候要死好几次但是并不妨碍我说出自己的想法，我打完了一代的good ending之后那种压抑中的温馨伴随着我到了第二部。
生化奇兵二很多人认为是一代的一个dlc但我不认同，我更倾向于它是一部独立的作品，在开头我就被震撼到了，我变成一代中保护小妹妹的大老爹了而且武器也变成了大老爹的武器（钻头是真的强！），然后二代的剧情我是一知半解，而且新的敌人新的破解方式让我眼前一新，二代最最最最让我大吃一惊的地方便是当主角被抓起来的时候，我们操纵着小妹妹帮助女儿找大姐姐的装备，在小女孩的眼中我们看到的是一片繁华温暖的景象而且最后还可以召唤自己的女儿协同作战。那种寂寞孤身一人的感觉一扫而空，而小女孩的眼中这座海底城市围绕着的死寂的气息也消失了。至此我并没有感觉生化奇兵与其他的同时期好评的大作的区别。
经历了那么多的压抑之后，我渴望着温暖的景色，于是我打开了无限，站在教堂的面前内心久久不能平静，背景音乐的哈利路亚同时为我的心灵笼罩了一层圣洁的光。穿梭在熙熙攘攘的人群中，看着温暖的城市和寂静的小巷，看着那盛开在四处的花朵，我忽然感受到了幸福这是其他游戏在游戏伊始所给予不了的，我知道最终这座城会堕落会变得像销魂城一般，于是我在这座城里转了很久，傻傻的和npc坐在一起我看着他，他看着我。然而好景不长直到我遇见了这城市的第一个弊病，这座城的美好面容开始崩塌在我眼前，这次的敌人是真正的人类，而不是残暴的修补者，我并没有感到害怕，我勇敢的向前走去向着那许多年前的变量走去，我找到了伊丽莎白之后才知道这游戏才刚开始，直到现在我玩完了无限的本体我真的很希望那第一次见面就变成永恒。我看着伊丽莎白在人群中舞蹈看着她拿着棉花糖跟在我的身后，她在战斗中帮助我，我看着每次她发脾气时的可爱表情，她也容忍了我的残暴，我记得游戏里说过一句不用担心伊丽莎白她会在战斗中保护好自己，但是我做不到，我无时无刻都在注视着她我渴望她出现在我的面前我放心不下她，我不想让她看到自己的杀戮，就这样我玩完了无限。抛开主人公的身份是伊丽莎白的父亲，在我的心中伊丽莎白已经变成了我生命中的伴侣，我真的没想到这款游戏对我影响这么大，她会永远留在我的心里。我已经不打算玩海葬dlc了，我知道伊丽莎白已经去不了巴黎了，不过她还活在我的心里，永远。
我有好多的话想说，但是又不知道如何说就写这些吧。只有完整玩完了三部才能体会到生化奇兵的真谛。
Bioschock 4 NEREDESİNNN
Horrible Unreal Engine 3 issues where the game keeps cycling between low and high-resolution assets. The mouse sensitivity settings suck.
这款游戏相对来说比较久了，之前没什么时间玩游戏。刚好现在补票玩，已经通关一周目了，到现在来体验这款游戏的剧情。还是超赞的 放到以前的年代来说的话 简直是神作。现在体验也很有感觉！好游戏 任何说法都不如你直接去自己玩一边 值得你补票亲自体验一下 ~

BioShock will always mean 1 and 2 to me. That said, Infinite as a stand alone and break from the original story is done amazingly. I still think the original two games are the best, but infinite is far from a let down. Graphics that still hold up by todays standards, great story, memorable characters, and a solid, fluid, and simple combat system really make the game an obvious choice for anyone who enjoys the genre

Fun first person shooter gameplay with an interesting and exciting story. I enjoyed the story way more than Bioshock 2, and pretty equal to the first. It ran naively on Linux, which is always a plus.

玩了16小时，打通了一周目，讲讲女主伊丽莎白吧（有一点点剧透）

她太贴心了，在我干架的时候，会给我弹药、血包、蓝包，在我漏找道具的时候，给我钱币、开锁工具，可以说，我这条命就是伊丽莎白给我救回来的，哭死，哪里还能找到这么好的npc啊；她太可爱了，在我找道具时，她会在旁边弯下腰细细查看着周围，在我停在一个地方挂机时，她会找个椅子安安静静地坐着，乖乖的，她也会闹情绪，在后面和伊丽莎白起分歧时，让她开锁后，也不像以前开锁后会讲一句 简简单单的锁 之类的话，而是和你闹别扭，不讲话。伊丽莎白被塑造的太有血有肉了，不像一个npc，而像一个陪你冒险的女孩。

谢谢她陪我过了一个特别的520，今天是521，我永远喜欢伊丽莎白！！！等等，她好像是我女儿来着。。

This is my least favorite of the Bioshock games but is still one of my favorites. The graphics even in 2021 are still pretty good. The story in my opinion is on the weaker side. The gameplay is also weaker than the previous two Bioshock games by limiting the types of weapons you can have on you but there a lot of mediocre weapons. Skyhook is great though. You can't constantly use vigors like in the other Bioshock games or even really constantly recharge your health by finding med kits. The ending also didn't feel like a Bioshock ending. The Lutece twins are never really explained for why they are helping you. I love the DLCs though. Personally I love Rapture and seeing a bit of it before the war makes me want to get a whole game to explore prewar Rapture.
it's a very interesting game with out of this world graphics and gameplay, the whole story line of the game is amazing.

요도바들이 플레이하는 영상을 예전에 흥미롭게 봤던 기억이 있었읍니다.
그런데 이번에 세일하는 걸 목격하고 말았지요. 냉큼 집었읍니다.
개인적으로 플레이하면서 느끼는 점은 마치 영화를 보는 것같다! 창의적이다! 상당히 디테일하다! 였읍니다.
머리가 나빠서 플레이 한번으로는 스토리가 완벽히 이해가 안되는 것같아 두 세 번정도 플레이를 더 해볼 참입니다.
원래 스토리형 엪피에스 게임할 때 이해가 완벽히 안되는 부분이 생겨도 한번 플레이한걸로 만족하는 편인데, 
게으른 저를 더 일하게 만드는 바이오쇼크...
꽤 멋진 게임일지도...?

아 플레이 중에 하나 아쉬웠던 점이 있었는데 인게임에서 얻는 녹음기에 캐릭터들 영어 음성 흘러나오잖아요..?
스토리 이해에 도움될거같아 들을려고 하면 한글자막이 따로 안 뜨더라구요..? 제가 이상한건지 원래 자막 안뜨는건지는 모르겠는데 자막 안 뜨는것도 상당히 이상한거같긴 합니다만... 암튼 그 부분 딱 한 가지가 아쉽습니다.
그렇지만 스토리 이해정도야 유튭 참고하면 되니깐여^ㅡㅡ^ 노프라블람^------^

Just a waste of money. I'm glad I only payed 7 bucks for this game that doesn't work. ok i went into this excepting a shitty story because of what i heard from other people but hoo boy its actually really good once you reach the end which was a pleasant surprise on top of the excellent combat loop. i cant say anything about the story without heavily risking spoilers but ill do my best to explain the sheer fun of the combat.

so this game continues the series tradition of making the combat more fast paced and combo focused with each new game, and while it comes at the expense of a two weapon limit and a heavily cut down upgrade system and weapon lineup (making the game much less of an immersive sim and something more along the lines of half life) these changes are made up for by the amazing feeling weapons and the sheer utility of the replacements for plasmids, vigours.

vigours will be immediatley recognizable to fans of the first two games as bodily "upgrades" that alow the player to perform various powerful elemental attacks. in previous games the lineup was around 15 or so plasmids but what was in those games has been boiled down to the most commonly used plasmids and then some. the new abilities you can get from vigours include shooting electic crystals that explode whe ntouched by enemies, flaming grenades, the ability to peck people to death with crows, and much more.

by using vigours in combat to assist your gunplay, as well as the extra manuverability allowed by faster movement speeds and the new sky line mechanic, i found myself zipping around the arena swapping out guns to fight my enemies in the high ground, using flames to block off flank routes, and taking potshots on the offchance i was stuck behind cover. this game can easily be completed without using any plasmids in combat, but it will be significantly more difficult and players will find the game as just plain old unfun until they start throwing their enemies in the air and shooting them like skeets.
NICE BUT THE END WAS NOT SO GOOD
